name: UPROOT: The Crop Throwing Simulator
description:
Made for Edmonton Global Gamejam 2023.

The Crows Are Coming!

Stop them from stealing your crops by... throwing crops at them? Yeah, you might not be the smartest farmer, but you sure do have the strongest crops.

How far can you get? I'd love to see your highscores. I, as the developer, have only been able to get to wave 7 myself. It gets really hard, really fast.

This was a fun game to make, however other than maybe the occasional bugfix, I do not intend to continue development. I do hope some people come across this and get some enjoyment out of it, though.
